resources.string: Without the permission for the location and access to body sensors the app will be unable to connect to Google Fit.
You need to log into a Google account to use this app. It depends on the fitness store from the Google Fit API.
Select ♂ if you have a lot of testosterone. Select ♀ if you are more the estrogen type.
This app uses your birthdate to calculate your age. The age is needed because the body fat ratio changes while aging.
